text.emotional: I will now go and carve something. [happiness, low ]My next figurine is called “David falling off his tractor into a mud pit”[/happiness] - again, it is a figurine grounded in reality.
text.silence: {.} i will now go and carve something {....} my next figurine is called david falling off his tractor into a mud pit {....} again {...} it is a figurine grounded in reality {...}
